notFound.text: Have you seen my mobile phone?

notFound2.text: Nope, no idea, check again the rest of the class just in case.
If i see something I'll let you know.

found.text: Have you seen anybody entering the toilets recently?

prankChoices.text: (Stick the poster carefully and leave wordless)

pranked.text: (I hope they tell me now where my phone is)

root.text_male: I cannot go there, it's the girls' bathroom.
root.text_female: I cannot go there, it's the boys' bathroom.
